frameDefinitions: An Agent has committed a Wrong in the past and is making Amends for it.
An Authority excuses an Offense that an Offender has committed, with the effect of ending or preventing any punishment.
A Patient is committed to the care of a medical Facility by a proper Authority.
Temporary or permanent Styles and Configurations of Hair, as well as its inherent Nature.
A New_member becomes a member of a socially-constructed Group.
frameExamples: He <t>atoned</t> for his sin with good works.
President Ford <t>pardoned</t> her after it came to light she was being held in Japan as an 'enemy alien' and was secretly working to subvert the broadcasts DNI
Ten years after Abraham Lincoln's assassination, a Chicago court declared his 56-year-old widow Mary insane and <t>committed</t> her to a mental institution.
On either side her head gleamed coiled <t>braids</t> of dark-gold hair , almost pale copper in the subdued light of the room .
Seven new members and the three countries <t>joined</t> the alliance five years ago.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> has committed a <fen>Wrong</fen> and is making <fen>Amends</fen>.
<fen>Wrong</fen> identifies the act committed by the <fen>Agent</fen> for which <fen>Amends</fen> are made.
<fen>Amends</fen> marks expressions that indicate what the <fen>Agent</fen> does to compensate for the <fen>Wrong</fen> that was committed.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> atones for the <fen>Wrong</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Agent</fen> expiates the <fen>Wrong</fen>.
This role denotes the offender that seeks or gets the pardon.
Authority is the organization or person taht grants the pardon.
This role denotes the the illegal act that the <fen>Offender</fen> is pardoned for.
This role denotes the time when the pardon is given
The location at which the pardoning takes place.
The person who is committed to a facility with a view towards helping them mentally or physically.
The facility where the <fen>Patient</fen> is taken for treatment.

The <fen>Authority</fen> is the actor carrying out the institutionalization with proper legal authorization, either invested into them in general by the government or granted due to power of attorney over the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The time interval during which the institutionalization happens.
The location in which the <fen>Facility</fen> is situated.
This role is the hair itself
This role is the Possessor of the body part.
Temporary Configurations of hair (eg braid, bun, ponytail).   Something done to the hair merely by movement.
A property of the hair (eg curly, fine, brown).  This acts much like 'Descriptor' in the Observable_bodyparts Frame.  Colors, styles, natural properties are described by this frame element.
The <fen>New_member</fen> becomes a member of a (socially-defined) <fen>Group</fen>.
The <fen>Group</fen> is a socially-constructed entity composed of members.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>New_member</fen> joins the <fen>Group</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the joining occurs.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Syria</fex> has atoned for its support of Iraq.
Smithers is atoning <fex>for his misspent youth</fex>.
He atoned for his sin <fex>with good works</fex>.
Defense minister Ivanov rules out pardon <fex>for Chechen rebel leader Maskhadov</fex>.
<fex>The governement</fex> issued a pardon to the two convicts.
They demanded a pardon to John <fex>for inadverdent manslaughter</fex>.
The families demanded a <fex>posthumous</fex> pardon for the executed soldiers.

On 1 March 2002, Andreyev was found guilty of libel and conditionally sentenced
to two years in prison and then pardoned <fex>in the courtroom</fex>.

Buffy's got this hospital phobia because her caring parents institutionalized
<fex>her</fex> for a while before she moved to Sunnydale.

Unfortunately for Mrs. Lincoln, her son, Robert, institutionalized her <fex>in the
Batavia Asylum</fex> shortly after the visit to St. Charles.
Goodrum then went to see <fex>a private doctor</fex> <fex>who</fex> hospitalized him.
<fex>Later</fex> her mother became depressed and was institutionalized.

The widow of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. suffered a stroke on Wednesday, and was
hospitalized <fex>in Atlanta</fex>.
Have <fex>you</fex> signed up for the new Medicare Prescription program?
An avid skier myself, I ventured to Aspen and enrolled in Nevin's school <fex>last winter</fex> to see what all the fuss was about.
